subject.outfit: A tight-fitting, long-sleeved, lavender or light lilac mini dress (or romper/bodysuit). The fabric appears to be a matte, stretchy activewear material (spandex/nylon blend). Features a large, open-back cutout exposing the mid and upper back. Distinctive ruched 'scrunch' detailing along the vertical seam of the buttocks to accentuate shape.

pose.orientation: Standing, angled away from the camera (dorsal/rear view), twisting the torso to look back over the left shoulder.
pose.spine_and_posture: Pronounced arch in the lower back. Shoulders are angled downwards relative to the camera view. The neck is rotated to the left.
pose.limbs: Left arm is bent at the elbow, hand resting near the clavicle. Right arm is extended downwards, partially obscured. Legs are straight, standing on a paved surface.
pose.head_tilt: Chin slightly tucked, face angled upward towards the camera lens.
pose.details: Barefoot with white toenail polish visible.

environment.ground: Light grey concrete slabs or pavers with visible seams.
environment.background_elements: A textured beige stucco pillar or wall on the immediate left foreground. Background contains blurred green trees and foliage, suggesting a residential or park-like setting.
environment.depth: Shallow depth of field; the subject is sharp, while the background vegetation is soft and out of focus.

camera.angle: High angle shot (camera positioned above the subject looking down at roughly 45 degrees).
camera.framing: Medium-full shot, capturing from the top of the head down to the ankles/feet.
camera.perspective: Perspective foreshortening emphasizes the head and shoulders while tapering towards the feet. The downward angle accentuates the curvature of the back and hips.
camera.lens_characteristics: Sharp focus on the subject, slight background bokeh.

lighting.type: Natural daylight, likely overcast or open shade.
lighting.quality: Soft, diffused lighting with no harsh, direct sun highlights on the skin. Shadows are soft and gradual.
lighting.skin_rendering: Realistic skin texture with natural sheen on the forehead and nose. visible collarbone shadows.

mood_and_expression.expression: Confident, alluring, with a subtle, closed-mouth smile and direct eye contact.

subject.description: Young adult female with long, straight platinum blonde hair featuring dark roots. She has a deep tan skin tone and a voluptuous, curvy physique with a very prominent bust and wide hips. She is wearing a black triangle bikini top that struggles to contain her chest volume, revealing significant cleavage and breast curvature. She wears matching black bikini bottoms, pulled high on the hips (thong style). A visible tattoo is located on her right lower abdomen/pelvis area.
subject.anatomy: Voluptuous hourglass figure. Heavy, full chest with natural gravitational weight, soft tissue compression against the arm and bikini top. Thighs are thick and soft, resting on the bed. Facial features include a scrunched nose expression while biting, defined jawline, and groomed eyebrows.
subject.clothing: Black string bikini set. The top is a simple triangle cut with thin straps. The bottoms are skimpy, resting high on the hip bone.

pose.posture: Sitting cross-legged (tailor style) on a bed. The torso is angled slightly towards the mirror. Her weight is settled deeply into the soft mattress.
pose.arms_and_hands: The right arm is raised, hand holding a large slice of cheese pizza directly to her mouth, actively taking a bite. The left arm is extended forward, holding a smartphone (iPhone with a sticker-covered case) to capture a mirror selfie.
pose.head: Head is tilted slightly, eyes looking at the phone screen/mirror reflection. Face is partially obscured by the pizza slice.
pose.action: Simultaneously eating pizza and taking a mirror selfie.

environment.setting: Hotel room or bedroom at night.
environment.foreground: A white bed with a textured, quilted duvet. Scattered on the bed are: an open cardboard pizza box with grease stains and the text 'OPEN 24 HOURS' (appears reversed as 'SRUOH 42 NEPO' due to mirror reflection), a white can of 'White Claw' hard seltzer, a clear plastic container with a dessert (tiramisu or cake) and a plastic spoon, and a brown luxury handbag (Louis Vuitton monogram pattern).
environment.background: A sliding glass door leading to a dark balcony. White vertical curtains hang to the right. A bedside lamp with a white shade is visible on the left.
environment.context: Casual, late-night snacking scene in a hotel room.

lighting.quality: Soft but directional, creating shadows under the legs and pizza box. There is a slight flash reflection or specular highlight on the sliding glass door.
lighting.shadows: Natural contact shadows where the body meets the bedding and under the pizza box.
lighting.tone: Warm, cozy, slightly yellow/orange cast typical of hotel room lighting.

mood_and_expression.expression: Playful scrunched nose and closed eyes/focused gaze while taking a large bite of pizza. A 'foodie' aesthetic moment.

She is wearing a tight, blue floral-print halter-neck one-piece swimsuit or bodysuit featuring bright pink flowers and green leaves. The garment has a deep plunging neckline that reveals significant cleavage.

The chest mass is full, projecting forward and outward, heavily affected by gravity due to natural weight. The bust depth is visibly greater than the ribcage depth. The torso is slender, creating a dramatic bust-to-waist ratio. Skin texture is natural with visible pores, faint freckles, and soft tissue volume.

camera.perspective: Eye-level or slightly lower, capturing the subject from a flattering but realistic angle.

characteristics.sensor_noise: Subtle luminance noise to mimic high-ISO indoor shooting.
characteristics.sharpness: High sharpness on the face and clothing texture, slightly softer background.
characteristics.focus: Sharp focus on the eyes and face.

lighting.direction: Frontal and slightly overhead, creating soft shadows under the jawline and defining the contours of the body.
lighting.quality: Even illumination, no harsh contrast. Highlights on the face are soft and broad, not blown out. Natural fall-off on the limbs.
lighting.shadows: Soft, realistic contact shadows where the clothing meets the skin and in the folds of the fabric.

mood_and_expression.tone: Casual, candid, confident, and slightly flirty.
mood_and_expression.authenticity: Feels like a snapshot taken by a friend or a casual social media photo, avoiding a staged studio look.

style_and_realism.fidelity: High fidelity to material properties (cotton blend of hoodie, spandex sheen of shorts, human skin).

colors_and_tone.palette: Neutral and desaturated background (whites, beiges) contrasting with the black hoodie and grey shorts. Warm skin tones.
colors_and_tone.white_balance: Neutral to slightly warm indoor tungsten balance.
colors_and_tone.contrast: Moderate natural contrast, preserving details in the black clothing shadows.

quality_and_technical_details.textures: Visible fabric weave, realistic hair sheen, authentic skin pores.

aspect_ratio_and_output.composition: Vertical portrait framing, centering the subject's upper body and hips.

controlnet.pose_control: OpenPose matching the twist of the torso and the head turn.
controlnet.depth_control: Depth map preserving the volume of the figure against the flat background.
controlnet.canny_edge: Soft edge detection to maintain the silhouette of the hoodie and shorts.

subject.description: Young adult female with long, voluminous, straight platinum blonde hair parting in the middle and falling over shoulders. She has a tan complexion, blue eyes, and soft facial features with defined makeup including eyeliner and pink lipstick. Her physique is a pronounced hourglass shape with a very full, heavy bust showing significant forward projection and natural gravity, a slim waist, and wide, curvaceous hips. Skin texture is realistic with natural imperfections and smooth tanning.

apparel.top: Green triangle bikini top with distinct yellow piping/trim. The top is string-tied at the neck. The cups are strained by the bust volume, showing ample cleavage.
apparel.bottom: Matching green high-cut bikini bottoms with yellow piping/trim, pulled high over the hips.
apparel.accessories: A thin gold necklace with a small green pendant, a gold ring on the left hand, a gold bangle bracelet on the left wrist, and a black hair tie on the right wrist.

pose.stance: Kneeling directly on the sand, facing the camera. The subject is sitting back on her heels with knees spaced apart. Her torso is upright with a slight arch in the lower back.
pose.arms: The left arm is bent upwards with the hand lightly grasping the left bikini strap near the collarbone/chest area. The right arm hangs naturally by her side, with the hand resting near the right thigh/sand.
pose.head_and_gaze: Head is upright, facing forward. Eyes are looking directly into the camera lens with a soft, confident expression.

environment.location: A sunny public beach area near a park.
environment.foreground: Textured, light beige sand with visible footprints and uneven surface details.
environment.background: A grassy park elevation behind the beach. Elements include green bushes, tall palm trees against a blue sky, concrete picnic tables, a gray SUV parked on the right side, and a glimpse of a playground structure.
environment.sky: Bright blue sky with scattered soft white clouds.

camera.shot_type: Medium shot, framing the subject from the knees up to the top of the head.
camera.angle: Eye-level relative to the kneeling subject, creating a direct and intimate perspective.
camera.depth_of_field: Moderate depth of field; the subject is razor-sharp, while the background elements (car, trees, tables) are slightly softened but clearly distinguishable.
camera.perspective: Natural perspective without wide-angle distortion, preserving the true scale of the body volumes.

lighting.source: Natural bright daylight, high noon sun.
lighting.quality: Hard, direct sunlight creating high contrast.
lighting.shadows: Distinct shadows cast by the hair onto the shoulders, under the chin, and under the bust. The body casts a shadow on the sand behind/beneath the knees.
lighting.highlights: Bright highlights on the forehead, shoulders, chest, and thighs, accentuating the skin's texture and oil/sheen.

mood_and_expression.expression: Neutral to slightly smiling, engaging directly with the viewer.

style_and_realism.aesthetic: Sharp, vibrant, and detailed, characteristic of high-quality social media or lifestyle photography.
style_and_realism.render_quality: 8k resolution, raw photo aesthetic, no artistic stylization.
